name: Mich
speed: Normal 30 ft., Burrow 30 ft., Climb None, Fly None, Swim None, Other None

traits.name: (Striker) Savage Assault
traits.text: Once per turn, add your level in extra damage to an attack.

traits.name: Shifty
traits.text: You can _Disengage_ as a bonus action.

actions.name: Bash
actions.text: _Melee Weapon Attack:_ [attack] vs AC. _Hit:_ [damage, d4] slashing damage.

actions.name: Kill
actions.text: _Melee Weapon Attack:_ [dc-primary] vs Strength. _Hit:_ the target is pushed up to 10 ft away.
